comments.body: where do you like to work?
Hello!  I've got a great job available for you as a Designer.  Any interest?
I am interested, but I would like to know the salary.
Comes with two days off each week!  lol
I'm worth more than that.  I need it to pay $60,000.00.
I can get you up over $58K to start, and then we can take a look in six months.  Would that work?
The salary is fine.  I also want three weeks paid vacation.
I can't do that, but what I can do is keep your earnings the same and throw in a third day off each week.
That's another 52 days off, instead of just 15 (three weeks).. just saying....
Can I have at least one week's vacation on top of the extra day off per week. I like to take my child to Disney once per year.
I can work on the two Fridays before my vacation and the two fridays after to almost even it out.
I can't do that from here, but I'm sure you could work with your manager to turn some of those extra days off into a few consecutive days.
Really, I'm kinda tapped out on my end.  I hope you accept this great job offer!
Here it is again if you wanna take another look...
What about an engineer job with google?
What kind of job are you looking for?
I would like to work in either Sydney or Beijing
I would like to offer a sales job to you at Facebook.
Okay, I think google would be a good place though.
It would be at the Beijing office.
Is there any room for someone at Seoul?
It looks like Beijing and Sydney are where I need employees.
I could work in Beijing as an engineer or as a designer?
We plan to start you at 19, does that sound good?
I am looking for a job that pays 50 an hour / Manager at Amazon in Sydney
Sorry, I misread that. what makes your eperience and position worth 50?
Because I have the years of experience in a management position
I also think you need 2 days for weekly holday. 4 seems like too much
This is what I feel that I am worth
We have lots of qualified candidates. Also we will be putting you with Google instead
How would you feel about becoming a Designer?
It allows for 2 days off a week.
Is it a consistent schedule?  What is a normal schedule for this position?\
What company is the position with?
....although it is located in Tokyo, it it consistant with any other normal work week. 5 days on  2 off.
And it is with a great company....Apple.
Are they willing to pay for moving expenses?
It will start as soon as you are ready to begin, and accept the offer. And I'm sure they would be willing to work with you on the expenses of moving so far away.
I am very interested but am looking to start around $38.00/hour.
I think it could be negotiated to start at $35 an hour if it would help you make a decision.
Are you searching for a job?
Have any open positions in Sydney or China?
Searching for a job there, that is.
I have experience as a designer and engineer. No management experience but I'm open for anything!
I like the hours and position. Perhaps we could up the holiday to 3?
How does this proposal look for you?
I want to work at google
I can offer the following positions
Engineer at Google, Designer at Google
Then Designer at Apple, and Engineer at apple
Do any of these positions interest you?
I would have to lower the salary to 28
Apple sales is a rather undesirable position i'm looking for
I can accept that.  thank you
What kind of job opportunities do you have?
Apple would be a great company for me to work for. I have always wanted to use my sales skills with apple
feel free to propose to me
Today, we're looking to hire people at Apple!
i am not interested in apple
We need managers, deisgners, and salespeople!
There is a designer position open at Facebook
Ok, the position is open in Seoul and Sydney
Excellent, we can make that work
Here is an initial offer, does this work for you?
that should be a pretty even offer
I can raise the salary a little, but keep the days at 3
how about as a manager or designer?
i think facebook will provide you with a better working environment
Designer at Facebook in sydney would be nice
i heard that designers love living there and the corporate office is nice
ill do engineer at facebook if i can get a VERY high salary
would you be interested in that position?
Hello, what kind of position are you seeking?
I want a designer role at Facebook or at Google
I have worked in that role for 5 years
I will see what I can do
I agree to your proposed salary of 30
Hello. I am looking to hire a new employee.
Great, I am looking for a new job as well
Do you have any previous experience? We do have some engineer positions open.
There is an Amazon Manager position open. Also for designer there. Also engineer at Facebook.
I have sales experience for 6 years
I'd prefer to work at Facebook or Apple
I see. How about I send you an offer and we can talk about it?
Sure, but I must admit that I can't work at Tokyo.
I have no interest in Japan.
I see. If that is the case, I may only have limited positions open.
Or Seoul either. China or Australia is fine
You can propose and let's take it from there
OK. I'll see what I can find.
OK. I found one position left as a Manager. Your sales experience will probably come in handy.
Please let me know your salary and holiday requirements and I can fine tune this offer.
That's an insult to my profile. I asked for Sales, you declined that. I said Apple or facebook, you gave amazon. I did not want Seoul, and you gave me that
Well, here is what I can propose to you
Ok, I am ready to hear an offer.
This is how I felt after I saw your proposal.
I'll try to be fair with future offers.
The main problem is the vast majority of reasonable positions are in Japan.
So I'm very limited with other countries as far as reasonable salary and holiday are concerned.
And sales jobs are almost non existent for the companies you mentioned.
Well it is a negotiation, a two way discussion. As far as I can see on the jobs portal - I see there are various sales positions in Sydney and Beijing
Yes, they are there. But the packages are a losing proposal. I'll try to send one more offer here.
Yes, that is due to the location.
Workers in that country are paid low.
So if you want a sales position paying $50, I cannot reasonably accept that.
But if you are willing to relocate to Japan, I can pay you much higher salary and more holiday.
Well, I offered that proposal in response to your outrageously annoying offer
We can work around with the salary for sales position if you'd like
You can submit a further offer and we can hopefully work something out.
I would like to be fair.
If you are willing to take 3 weekly holidays instead of four, I'll agree to it.
Provided the salary remains the same.
I am just asking such a low pay of 22$ so that I can avail 4 days week
The location and position can also be the same that you prefer.
If you want to work at Facebook in Sydney for sales, 3 holidays is the most I can give you starting out.
In that case, I would demand a higher salary of minimum 56$
I could not offer that given your location - 22 is on the high side of the scale.
You can decide now. All my expertise and experience will come in handy and I can relocate later down the lane,
It's due to the preferred location. If you were willing to accept Japan, we could probably agree.
But I understand Toyko is out for you.
I am sorry too, it looks like we both are ending up wasting our time rather than settling for a win-win
Do you have a final offer? I'll be willing to consider it.
what categories are most important to you
Well, the company and location are very important to me
position&company and weekly holiday are important for me
What is your position on Facebook?
I feel that company suits me very well
i can put you with facebook
let me put together a proposal
Also, how about Seoul as the city of placement?
Ok, I feel like this is a good starting point, let's work from here
I'm actually even willing to go down to 2 (!!) days on holiday
if we can find agreement in other areas
i can put you in tokyo though
Well, location is very important for me...
is tokyo not good for you?
Sadly, it's the worst possible option in my current state
I'm willing to negotiate on days, salary
Are there other positions open at Facebook?
I like many jobs here. It's a great place to work!
I can get you a managing job at Facebook
can you do sydney or beijing?
wow that goe a lot worse
I have a job opening at Amazon as an engineer or manager.
very prestigious! i need this to be in seoul
I can do Seoul as long as it's 3 days a week holiday.
no can do. I take a lot of religious holidays
I can do more if you work in Sydney
id be willing to make that commute. what kind of salary are we talking?
We have sales positions at Google, Facebook
I can only do it with a 5 or 6 day/week holiday
Okay , let me see what I have got for you
I'd be willing to take a lower salary for 6 day/week in seoul. I'd also be willing to take 5day/week and no salary in any other location
This is the best I can offer
Hello what position are you looking to work?
Ok and what salary would you be comfortable with
I could do Tokyo but I have to lower your wage to 24 an hour
actually I could do 38 at Beijing
Hi! May I interest you in Amazon or Facebook?

Bejing or Seoul would be my top spots to work

I can do 32/hour with 3 holidays per week

I could do Sydney for 42 and 4 holidays
How about 37 and 4 holidays, that's the lowest i can go
compensation would have to go down to 30 for 5 holidays
30 salary and 5 holidays and i will accept

Great! What were you thinking in terms of salaray?

As far as salary, let's start at $30?
I would prefer that you be in Seoul
OK. I can accept a position there.
How about $30/hr for a Google Manager in Seoul.
I'll give you 4 if you can be a designer at amazon
I would not be a good designer, to be honest.

so what job interests you my friend?
I am interested in a managerial position

seoul does not work how about more holidays

here is what I am thinking
I can do sales in apple

what are your first two choices of job location?

absolutely, but it may need to be balanced against your salary

alright, considering your other requests, I feel this is a good offer:
Either Sales or Manager with Amazon
